attributes.action: ensure that a groom consults his family and friends before comitting to his wedding vows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Entering into a marriage is a big commitment and is all too often entered into without a full appreciation of how ones life can change. Forcing the Groom to consult his peers will minimise the chances of making a mistake.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
